subject: Psychology
title: Sleep Hygiene
description: A fast breakdown of Sleep Hygiene for builders.

hook.text: She did everything wrong: coffee at 4pm, screens until midnight, a warm room. Then she wondered why she couldn't sleep.

buildup.text: Sleep hygiene refers to habits and environment conditions that promote consistent, quality sleep.

discovery.text: Key practices: consistent schedule, cool dark room, no caffeine after noon, and a wind-down routine before bed.

twist.text: Sleep hygiene alone doesn't cure insomnia. But poor hygiene can sabotage even a healthy sleeper's rest.

climax.text: Good sleep hygiene is the foundation. Without it, no supplement, app, or technique will fully compensate.

punchline.text: Sleep hygiene won't cure insomnia. But ignoring it guarantees trouble.

quiz.question: What is sleep hygiene?
options: Habits and conditions that promote consistent quality sleep
A medical treatment for chronic insomnia
The act of cleaning your bedroom before bed
